general_advisory: Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Choose the variety according to land type and resource available.
The variety like Swarna Shreya of 115-125 days is recommended.
Aromatic paddy like New Kalajeera and Kalajeera, Nua Acharmati are suggested.
If using own seeds, test the germination test before sowing.
Prepare a well-cultivated dry bed for paddy transplantation.
Sow seeds in specified lines and cover with soil.
Choose quality seeds of Arhar for sowing.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava for sowing after rainfall.
Choose good varieties like Kalinga Maize, Prabal for sowing.
Apply basal dose of NPK as per recommendations.
Choose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri-6 for sowing.
Treat the seeds with recommended products before sowing.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes for planting.
Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga for planting.
Seed material should have 2-3 eyes per piece.
